channel.title: Posts on Ops Monde
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ops Monde

item.title: Deploy a Hugo website using Github Actions on Github Pages - Part 1
item.description: In this Series Part 1: Setup Github repo to deploy Hugo website to Github Pages Part 2: Using Github Actions to Deploy a Hugo Website to Github Pages Introduction In the first part of this guide, I’m going to explain how I’m deploying this website to Github Pages with couple of git commit (and followed by git push of course). I’ll link to the other guides I used for reference as we go along the process.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Who? Hi there! I’m a systems engineer from the Maldives. Majority of my work is on design and implementing IT infrastructure and managing Ops of a small IT team. But lately I’ve been really automation, config management, cloud services and little bit of development. You can find more details on what I do at LinkedIn or say hello on Twitter Why? A bit of a background story. I always tend to research a lot and see what others are doing before I try to implement something; whether its a new technology, new practice etc.
